LV3.longDescription:
This aluminum-block V6 engine is capable of running on unleaded gasoline or up to 85% ethanol blends. It features 3 of GMC’s latest engine technologies that deliver power when needed and efficiency when less power is called for:
  • 285 hp @ 5300 rpm
  • 305 lb-ft of torque @ 3900 rpm
  • Active Fuel Management
  • Direct Injection
  • Variable Valve Timing

L83.longDescription:
The aluminum-block 5.3L EcoTec3 V8 engine runs on regular unleaded gasoline, or with optional FlexFuel capability, can run on up to 85% ethanol blends. It features the latest engine technologies that help deliver power when needed and efficiency when less power is called for:

  • 355 hp @ 5600 rpm
  • 383 lb-ft of torque @ 4100 rpm
  • More than 300 lb-ft of torque from 2,000 to 5,600 rpm
  • Active Fuel Management
  • Direct Injection
  • Variable Valve Timing

L86.longDescription:
The 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine features strong aluminum-block construction. This mighty powerplant is expected to make Sierra 1500 Denali one of the most powerful light-duty pickups available. It includes:
 
• Active Fuel Management
• Direct Injection
• Variable Valve Timing
• 8-speed automatic transmission

MYC.longDescription:
This smooth-shifting electronically controlled transmission with overdrive includes:

Tow/Haul mode
  • Raises transmission upshift points to provide more power to accelerate with a trailer or heavy load
  • Raises downshift points to use engine compression to help slow the truck instead of merely braking

Powertrain Grade Braking

  • Automatically uses the engine and transmission to slow the truck to maintain desired speeds when driving downhill
  • Reduces brake wear and increases vehicle control

Cruise Grade Braking

  • Downshifts automatically to slow the truck as it drives downhill if it exceeds the cruise set speed by a certain amount

M5U.longDescription:
Tow/Haul mode

  • Raises transmission upshift points to provide more power to accelerate with a trailer or heavy load
  • Raises downshift points to use engine compression to help slow the truck instead of merely braking Powertrain Grade Braking
  • Automatically uses the engine and transmission to slow the truck to maintain desired speeds when driving downhill
  • Reduces brake wear and increases vehicle control

No other competitor in Sierra’s class offers an available fully automatic locking rear differential:

  • It locks to turn both rear wheels in unison for added traction

Included with available Trailering equipment on Sierra Models.

  • Actively listens for unwanted engine sound through speakers within the cabin
  • Generates an opposite wave sound from the audio system speakers to cancel out the offending noise
  • Provides good sound control that allows the engine to be tuned for optimal fuel efficiency at all rpms
This feature is included with the 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine when the bench seat is ordered.

NKC.longDescription:
The active noise cancelation system offers an enhanced audio experience. The system:
  • Actively listens for unwanted engine sound through microphones within the cabin
  • Generates an opposite wave sound from the audio system speakers to cancel out the offending noise
  • Provides good sound control that allows engineers to tune the engine for optimal fuel efficiency at all rpms
This feature requires the available 6.2L EcoTec3 V8 engine.
